name: Electronic signature applet
short_description: A full PKCS11 java electronic signature applet based on IAIK Wrapper and JCE. Show document (txt or pdf) and sign it. Gemplus, ActicvCard, Oberthur, Shlumberger, Rainbow and more tokens are supported.
